author: dreedy
msg: The org.apache.river.api.lookup.* classes are not included into jsk-platform.jar, they reference classes that are found in jsk-lib.jar and/or jsk-dl.jar

author: uschindler
msg: Fix encoding bugs by copypaste, fix typo

author: dreedy
msg: Removed import of net.jini.discovery.LookupLocatorDiscovery. The net.jini.discovery.LookupLocatorDiscovery class is not in the jsk-platform module, and causes a compile error when included as an import. The import is only required since it is used in the @see javadoc directive. Including the fully qualified net.jini.discovery.LookupLocatorDiscovery class in the @see directive resolves the issue.

author: jlowe
